#summary How to compile python-tesseract for Homebrew(Mac Mountain Lion/Maverick)
#labels Featured

=How to compile python-tesseract (for Mac Mountain Lion/Maverick )=

launch xCode, then go to Preferences -> Downloads and install "Command Line Tools". 
Restart Terminal and you will be able to use Make.

==1. Install HomeBrew plus update the formulae(leptonica 1.7 and tesseract 3.03)==
_the homebrew version of leptonica and tesseract are very old. You need to "hombrew" yours_ 
===Option 1:=== 
{{{
cd /usr/local/.git && sed -i .bak 's|Homebrew|3togo|g' config
 
}}}
===Option 2:===
{{{
ruby -e "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.github.com/Homebrew/homebrew/go/install)"
brew install tesseract leptonica
brew uninstall tesseract leptonica
cd /usr/local/Library/Formula
brew install wget
rm tesseract.rb
rm leptonica.rb
wget -N https://bitbucket.org/3togo/python-tesseract/downloads/tesseract.rb
wget -N https://bitbucket.org/3togo/python-tesseract/downloads/leptonica.rb
}}}
===Option 3===
{{{
Use my homebrewed version if you have not yet installed any homebrew
ruby -e "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.github.com/Homebrew/homebrew/go/install)"
}}}

==2. remove old python (optional)==
{{{
brew uninstall opencv
brew rm python
brew install python
pip install --upgrade setuptools
pip install numpy --upgrade

export PYTHONPATH="/usr/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages:$PYTHONPATH"
}}}

==3. Install misc==
{{{
brew -v update && brew -v upgrade
brew install wget axel swig subversion
brew install leptonica tesseract  
brew install opencv
#brew tap homebrew/science                       #needed for the time being only (30 June 2013)
#brew install -vd --tbb opencv
#brew install homebrew/science/opencv    # enable above if this command line don't install opencv

}}}

4.
==Install python-tesseract==
Either
{{{
wget https://bootstrap.pypa.io/ez_setup.py -O - | python
#sudo easy_install https://bitbucket.org/3togo/python-tesseract/downloads/python-tesseract_0.8-3.0-py2.7_macosx-10.9-intel.egg
sudo easy_install https://python-tesseract.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/src/dist/python_tesseract-0.9-py2.7-macosx-10.9-x86_64.egg
}}}
or 
{{{
svn checkout http://python-tesseract.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/src python-tesseract
cd python-tesseract
export ARCHFLAGS="-arch x86_64"
export CFLAGS=-Qunused-arguments
export CPPFLAGS=-Qunused-arguments
python setup.py clean
python setup.py build
python setup.py install --user
export PYTHONPATH="/usr/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages:$PYTHONPATH"
python test.py
}}}
